entry.title: adam-rocska/timeout-typescript: A lightweight TypeScript utility to create a Promise that resolves after a specified delay. Ideal for async delays in Node.js and browsers.
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript utility to create a Promise that resolves after a specified delay. Ideal for async delays in Node.js and browsers.

entry.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
entry.content: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

entry.title: EasyLayer/transport-sdk: A lightweight SDK for easy client-side integration with EasyLayer applications
entry.content: A lightweight SDK for easy client-side integration with EasyLayer applications

entry.title: colddsam/Truth-Guardian: An advanced AI-powered fake news detection system that verifies text, images, and social media posts using Gemini AI, FastAPI, and Next.js. Includes a modern web interface, a lightweight Streamlit app, and a Chrome extension for real-time fake content detection. Built to combat misinformation with explainable AI results and contextual source links.
entry.content: An advanced AI-powered fake news detection system that verifies text, images, and social media posts using Gemini AI, FastAPI, and Next.js. Includes a modern web interface, a lightweight Streamlit app, and a Chrome extension for real-time fake content detection. Built to combat misinformation with explainable AI results and contextual source links.

entry.title: Kaso78/SolarProbe: Solar Probe is a lightweight web dashboard for monitoring solar activity in near real time. It integrates data from NOAA and NASA, including X-ray flux, solar proton levels, and sunspot metrics.
entry.content: Solar Probe is a lightweight web dashboard for monitoring solar activity in near real time. It integrates data from NOAA and NASA, including X-ray flux, solar proton levels, and sunspot metrics.

entry.title: Nikhilkumarseeda/user-crud-server: User-crud-server is a lightweight API designed for managing user data with simple create, read, update, and delete operations. It offers a straightforward interface for developers to integrate user management into their applications efficiently.

entry.title: 1landres/psfree-lapse: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
entry.content: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

entry.title: PedroFake02/better-link: A lightweight, powerful enhancement for Next.js Link components that automatically detects active routes. Provides intuitive APIs for handling active states with complete TypeScript support.

entry.title: adam-rocska/until-typescript: A lightweight TypeScript utility for repeatedly executing an asynchronous predicate until it resolves to true or times out. Supports customizable timeouts and retry intervals with TypeScript support.
entry.content: A lightweight TypeScript utility for repeatedly executing an asynchronous predicate until it resolves to true or times out. Supports customizable timeouts and retry intervals with TypeScript support.
